content: just keep swimming this cowl was designed with schools of fish in mind knitters are like fish we find our community help and protect each other we love this instructions cast on 120 sti tches with us6 needle place a marker and begin materials knitting in the round slipping the markers as you come to them yarn 1 skein fiber macgyver 100% knit 2 purl 2 rib for 7 rounds sw merino dk 246 yds/100g color school of fish dyed for mn yarn knit 60 place middle marker a different color knit 60 shop hop 2023 set up round k3 sl1 yo k2tog k1 x9 knit to middle marker sm k3 needles us6 24 circular notions darning needle 2 unique sl1 yo k2tog k1 x9 knit to end of round stitch markers skip to round 2 for 1st repeat size & gauge round 1 k3 sl1 yo k2tog k1 x9 knit to 5 stitches before middle marker slip 5 stitches to right hand needle remove middle marker slip 5 20 sts = 4 on a us6 in stockinette stitch stitches back to left hand needle and replace middle marker k3 sl1 yo 11 high x 23 circumference k2tog k1 x9 knit to end of round round 2 - 5 k3 sl1 k3 x9 knit to middle marker sm k3 sl1 k3 x9 abbreviations knit to end of r ound k=knit round 6 sm=slip marker *slip 3 stitches as if to purl from left needle to right needle hold the next sl1=slip next stitch as if to purl stitch this will be the stitch you slipped each round to the front of your k2tog=knit the next 2 stitches together work no need to use a cable needle it should be ok just hanging out slip the yo=yarn over 3 stitches back to the left needle and put the dropped slipped stitch back on the left needle the slipped stitch should now be the first stitch you ll knit k4 repeat from * 8 more times knit to middle marker sm repeat from * knitting remain ing stitches to 5 stitches before end of round slip 5 stitches to right hand needle remove end of round marker slip 5 stitches back to left hand needle an d replace end of round marker repeat round s 1 - 6 13 times or until desired height knit one round knit 2 purl 2 rib for 7 rounds bind off weave in ends block darnknitanyway com ©2023 darn knit anyway all rights reserved this is a free pattern stillwater mn we hope you make beautiful knit items for yourself or your loved ones 651 342 1386
